New Concentration.1: Demonstrate knowledge and understanding of variation in primate, hominin and human biology and behavior, over time and across space.
New Concentration.2: Demonstrate knowledge of and respect for the similarities and differences that characterize humans and human societies in the world, over time and across space.
New Concentration.3: Demonstrate knowledge and understanding of how and why change in human form and society occurs over time, as manifest around the world.
New Concentration.4: Demonstrate an understanding of the relationship between methods and their theoretical and practical applications
New Concentration.5: Understand ethical aspects of anthropological research and results.
